output_list.criticism: The functions do not check if the addition of the new balance and the old balance exceeds the maximum uint value. This can lead to an integer overflow, potentially leading to the loss of tokens.
The functions do not check if the addition of the new balance and the old balance exceeds the maximum uint value. This can lead to an integer overflow, potentially leading to the loss of tokens.
The functions do not check if the addition of the new allowance and the old allowance exceeds the maximum uint value. This can lead to an integer overflow, potentially leading to the loss of tokens.
The functions do not check if the addition of the new totalSupply and the new balance exceeds the maximum uint value. This can lead to an integer overflow, potentially leading to the loss of tokens.
The function does not check if the caller is the ico address before setting tokensAreFrozen to false. This can lead to unauthorized access and potential loss of tokens.
